name: The Dishwasher: VS
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Three marks remain!  Unlock The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile to dig further in to Yuki's bloody quest for revenge.  The full game features the Dishwasher's campaign storyline, online and offline coop play, 50 Arcade Challenges and Dish Challenge, including a ton of nasty new weapons and techniques.
